title: Best of The Herd for May 12, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for May 12, 2020
description:
Who cares if Tom Brady and Josh McDaniels didn't get along, they won

MLB revenue sharing dispute looks really bad during this pandemic 

Brett Favre is right that it is not Aaron Rodgers job to mentor Jordan Love

Colin's Top 10 most interesting NFL teams in 2020

Michael Jordan is a tough guy and that's really what people want 

Guest: David Spade, Actor & Comedian

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
